class_notes: (Prerequisites: BL 521 and 522 or equivalent) (HYBRID:  Meets in person on campus Tuesdays 4:00-5:45pm; meets online on Fridays 12:00pm-1:00pm)
course_description: Emphasis on increasing student's knowledge of Koine Greek vocabulary, grammar, and syntax through weekly readings covering portions of the New Testament and other Greek literature. This course may be repeated for credit when the reading selections vary.
prerequisites: This requirement mandates BL521 and BL522 as prerequisites.
schedule_location:
T 4pm-5:45pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_250
F 12pm-1pm in ONLINE
